T02D3304:47a-1: ma h'a k'a la s'a dha nam /
T02D3304:47a-3: mgon po nag po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3304:47a-4: de kho na bzhin du sngar bshad pa'i rim pas /
T02D3304:47a-5: stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes thogs la /
T02D3304:47a-6: sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la yi ge h'um
T02D3304:47a-7: gi de kho na nyid kha dog nag po yongs
T02D3304:47a-9: dpal dang ldan pa'i rje btsun mgon po nag po ste /
T02D3304:47b-1: 'bar ba chen po gri gug dang thod pa phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pas 'dzin pa /
T02D3304:47b-2: mgo bo'i phreng bas rgyan du byas pa /
T02D3304:47b-3: skra kham pa gyen la 'phyur ba /
T02D3304:47b-4: sku la do shal dang ldan pa /
T02D3304:47b-6: yan lag thams cad la 'jigs pa chen po dang ldan pa'i lto 'phyes brgyan pa /
T02D3304:47b-8: zhal nas khrag 'dzag par gyur par bdag nyid skad cig gis rnam par rdzogs par byas la /
T02D3304:47b-10: de la sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D3304:47b-11: aom sh'i ma h'a k'a la h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3304:47b-13: ra son yungs kar gyis mgon po nag po la bdug pa phul la /
T02D3304:47b-19: bdud rtsi rnams kyis mgon po nag po la gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3304:47b-21: aom sh'i ma k'a l'a ya sh'a sa n'a au
T02D3304:47b-22: pa h'a ri ne ae sha aa pa shtsi ma
T02D3304:47b-23: k'a ko aa yam ai dam /
T02D3304:47b-24: ratna tra y'a ya aa pa k'a ri nam ya
T02D3304:47b-25: di pra ti dznya smar si ta d'a ai dam
T02D3304:47b-26: / dusht'am kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi m'a ra m'a ra grihna grihna /
T02D3304:47b-28: ha na ha na da ha da ha pa tsa
T02D3304:47b-29: pa tsa di na me ke na m'ar ya h'um
T02D3304:47b-30: h'um phat phat / 'di la mngon spyod ni 'di yin te /
T02D3304:47b-31: tshva ba gsum gyis bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
T02D3304:47b-32: lus tshes mas gang bar byas te /
T02D3304:47b-33: dug dang skye tshes cho ga bzhin du bris la /
T02D3304:47b-34: me la gang gi ming nas bsros pa de ni de'i skad cig la mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3304:47b-35: slob dpon la ni rtag tu zhe sdang gang //
T02D3304:47b-36: dkon mchog gsum ni spong bar byed gang dang //
T02D3304:47b-37: sems can du ma gtso bar byed pa rnams //
T02D3304:47b-38: mgon po nag pos za bar byed pa yin //
T02D3304:47b-39: de lus sha ni gcod par byed pa dang //
T02D3304:47b-40: khrag kyang 'thung bar byed dang de bzhin du //
T02D3304:47b-41: mgo po la ni rnam par gnas byas nas //
T02D3304:47b-42: til tsam du ni gcod par byed pa yin //
T02D3304:47b-43: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher go bar bya ba yin no //
T02D3304:47b-44: dpal dang ldan pa'i mgon po nag po'i sgrub thabs yongs su rdzogs so /
T02D3304:47b-46: // / banda ta aa bha ya la sogs ba las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o /
T02D3304:47b-48: // / snying po rtog mkhas dag gis 'gal med chos
T02D3304:47b-49: kyang 'gal bar rtogs pa'i 'gro don bstan 'jug rim
T02D3304:47b-50: par bca' ba mdzad mod kyi //
T02D3304:48a-1: yangs 'gyur dang theg mchog dus 'dir rgyud bzhi'i snying
T02D3304:48a-2: khu mchog dang mchog min dngos grub rnams ni sgrub
T02D3304:48a-4: pa tshab tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur dge ba
T02D3304:48a-5: skyon bral des ni skye dgu chos mchog snod dang
T02D3304:48a-6: brtson ldan 'bras thob shog / dang por bdag sogs
T02D3304:48a-7: sgrib zad sngags pa'i chos ldan skad thabs gang gis
T02D3304:48a-8: 'dul bas rtag tu chos ni ston gyur ci /
T02D3304:48a-9: mos pa'i khyad par gyis rgya gar na sgrub thabs
T02D3304:48a-10: bsdus pa 'ga' zhig srid na yang gzhung snyan dngags
T02D3304:48a-11: dang ldan pas sam skri ta mchog tu gyur cing
T02D3304:48a-12: don bzang la gdams ngag che ba rnams bsdebs pa
T02D3304:48a-13: ; aa bha y'a k'a ra'i phyag dpe las pandi ta chen bo de dag dang /
T02D3304:48a-14: ba tshab kyi rigs su skyes pa'i dge slong tshul
T02D3304:48a-15: khrims rgyal mtshan gyis sngon gyi khrims las ma 'das
